title: Diabaths
author: Diabaths
created_time: May 04, 2023, 04:19:00 PMLast edit: May 07, 2023, 01:14:02 PM by Diabaths
content: Introduction:-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Crionic Coin is a new cryptocurrency that features a "hodl and profit" mining system accessible to everyone, invented by the developers of LitecoinCash. It works alongside traditional POW mining and has a ratio of 75% YespowerLTNCG and 25% Hive blocksGeneral Info:  -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Maximum Supply: 335999919.891 CRNC Coins created so far: 0 CRNC (@ Block #0, May  2023) Coins circulating: 0 CRNC (as of  May, 2023) Coins burned in the Hive so far: 0 CRNC (as of  May, 2023) First halving: Block #4200000 Block Time: ~20 seconds Number of confirmations needed for a transaction: 6 Premine: 3,360,000 coins (just 1% of max supply) Block Reward: 40 CRNC Halved every 4200000 blocksThe Hive Characteristics-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  Blocks for a new bee to mature: 48 * 51 = 2,448 blocks or approximately 12 hours.  Blocks a bee lives for after maturation: 48 * 24 * 29.75 = 34,272 blocks or approximately 7 days.  Target Hive block frequency: 1 out of every 4 blocks should be Hivemined.  Bee creation cost: ~0.05 CRNC.  Hive 1.1 activation: June 17, 2023 (more bee lives and more).  Optional to return 10% of bee creation to the community fund, which will be used to promote the coin.Block Reward-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Code:From Block To Block Coins Reward Total Coins Supply  Halving Time0  4.200.000 40,0000   168.000.000  19. comments.author: Diabaths
comments.body: We are thrilled to announce that the original mainnet Crionic-Coin chain will go live this Sunday May 7 20:00 GTM +3. This marks a significant milestone for our project, and we couldn't have done it without the support of our dedicated community.To celebrate this occasion, we will be launching a series of events and activities. Firstly, we will be hosting an invite contest on our Discord channel, with rewards for the first three users who bring in the most new members. The rewards will be 10,000 CRNC, 8,000 CRNC, and 5,000 CRNC, respectively. The contest will run for one week, starting from today.Secondly, we will also be launching an art contest for our community members to design the Crionic-Coin icon. The winner will be selected by the community and will receive a reward of 50,000 CRNC, with the second and third place receiving 20,000 CRNC and 10,000 CRNC, respectively. The contest will run for two weeks, starting from today.We encourage all members of the community to participate in these events and help us celebrate this important milestone. Thank you for your support, and we look forward to seeing you on the Crionic-Coin mainnet.Best regards,The Crionic-Coin Team

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: @OP, you mentioned you believe you will become one of the leading crypto in the market, so what do you think will set you apart from those thousand of alts which were abandoned, forgotten already?because from what i see here, this is like a substandard coin which you can prove me wrong. and if you will be running art contest, better if you can pay via btc, usdt or any coin that is tradable in the market. let's see if some people will participate using your coin as rewards...this is the first test if people will jump on this project.

comments.author: terciduk123
comments.body: Could you provide more information regarding your "hodl and profit" feature?Where do we acquire our profit? is it due to the increase of tokens due to staking, or is it due to the increase in token value?When will your website go live in its entirety?

However, if they do not deliver the files in the next few days, I will start building it on my own.

comments.author: scorpio18
comments.body: https://pool.coin-miners.info/site/gomining?algo=yespowerLTNCG Crionic has been added to CoinMiners Mining PoolFee: 0.5%Payouts are made automatically every 1 hours for all balances above 0.01, or 0.001 on Sunday.Stratum settings:Code: wildrig.exe -a yespowerltncg -o stratum+tcp://eu.coin-miners.info:7646 -u WALLET_ADDRESS.WORKER_NAME -p c=CRNCCode: SRBMiner-MULTI.exe --algorithm yespowerltncg --pool eu.coin-miners.info:7646 --wallet WALLET_ADDRESS --password  c=CRNCIf you want to mine solo add m=solo to the password like this Code:-p c=CRNC,m=soloDiscord channel https://discord.gg/szzvMEBNje
